segments.text: Good morning , Emma ! A lovely day , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . The sun is shining . There is no wind , only a pleasant breeze .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is the best season for a picnic right now . Have you decided the place for your picnic ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have decided to go to the park this Sunday . Would you like to go with us if you have not decided yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He â€™ s predicting clear skies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I will think it over .
segments.speaker: S2
